content.question: Which of the following students is likely experiencing symptoms of anorexia nervosa?

choices.label: Michale, who is fasting during the day as a religious observance but then feasts each night with his family
Amaya, who experiences nausea and sometimes even vomits when she thinks about going back to school, where she is bullied
Amare, who exercises for at least three hours per day and eats only a quarter of the calories they need per day, never any more than that
Niko, who tries to limit their calories to that required to maintain body weight, but has frequent episodes of eating sugary foods that make them far exceed the amount of calories they need per day

content.answer: Amare, who exercises for at least three hours per day and eats only a quarter of the calories they need per day, never any more than that

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
